title: Could we really rely on AI Technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: The AI is next generation of technology for business market. Some people are afraid that AI will replace humans in near future. Don’t worry it’s not like that rather it will decrease the workloads of human. Though AI is not fully implemented in Indian market only some of them are using, it will still take few more time to fully implemented. According to me up-to certain point we can rely on AI though its an advanced process than human. But any how it’s artificial and it can’t be like natural(humans) work. Is the answer helpful for you?
